snippet: Dufner’s 2013 P.G.A. Championship title has made more people pay attention to him and his game, even if his putting remains shaky and he has not won lately.
abstract: Jason Dufner's reign as the PGA Championship titleholder has ameliorated his social anxiety, but on the greens his angst has seemingly worsened; Dufner comes into championship event at Valhalla Golf Club in Louisville under difficult circumstances, nursing two bulging disks in his neck.
lead_paragraph: Dufner’s 2013 P.G.A. Championship title has made more people pay attention to him and his game, even if his putting remains shaky and he has not won lately.

headline.main: Jason Dufner Finds a Voice, if Not His Putting Stroke
headline.print_headline: P.G.A. Winner Finds a Voice, if Not His Putting Stroke
